pin.title: Beauty Boy
pin.text: Max is a very handsome cat. His parents like to call him 'beauty boy'.

pin.title: Bed hog
pin.text: Bobby likes to lay in the middle of the bed in such a way that her parents parents have to sleep on the very edges of the bed. She's a certified bed hog.

pin.title: Not the brightest
pin.text: She isn't the brightest bulb, but Peanut is the sweetest little girl you'll ever meet.
